an7.66:1.1: The sun is conveyed by seven golden horses (Rig Veda 4.13.03, 5.45.9; Arthavaveda 13.2.23; Maitrāyaṇī Saṁhitā 4.12.4), and has seven rays (Rig Veda 8.72.16). The seven quarters each have their own sun (Rig Veda 9.114.3), thus seven suns are mentioned (Arthavaveda 13.3.10).
an7.66:3.2: BB appears to omit kadaci karahaci etc here, it is in the following sections.
an7.66:12.2: BB (original edition) has a typo here, the close quote is omitted.
